channel.title: s on Merak.run
channel.description: Recent content in s on Merak.run

item.title: Saft
item.description: SAFT is the ‘Simple Agreement for Future Tokens’, is the document that explains the conditions for token distribution.

item.title: Seed
item.description: A seed, or wallet seed is a secret phrase that should never be communicated to anyone, as it is used to restore a wallet into a new computer or application, taking absolute ownership of it and all of the assets there.

item.title: Staking
item.description: Staking makes reference to the action of depositing some tokens to contribute with the number of tokens as participants into some action, for example, for mining other crypto currencies. By staking, you are contributing to the network and are able to earn rewards. Some recommendations: DYOR… in the end it’s nothing else than your assets at risk. Avoid the first set of validators, that will only give more power and destroy decentralization.
